Returns the classification table that was provided in the constructor of this instance of {{c|std::ctype&lt;char&gt;}}, or returns a copy of {{lc|classic_table()}} if none was provided.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A pointer to the first element in the classification table (which an array of size {{tt|std::ctype&lt;char&gt;::table_size}}).
